TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Hashim_Thaçi, title = Hashim_Thaçi, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hashim_Thaçi} }

S.FORM: I 1968 a miheca saka 4 folad saka 24 a romi'ad masofoc ci Hashim Thaçi , malamikomoday a tamdaw. O Sawara'an no kitakit no Kosovo anini i ci Hashim Thaçi, patirengan a romi'ad i 2016 a miheca saka 4 folad saka 7 a romi'ad.
